spec_data.Name: perl-Task-Kensho-Exceptions
spec_data.Description:
Task::Kensho is a list of recommended modules for Enlightened Perl
development. CPAN is wonderful, but there are too many wheels and you have
to pick and choose amongst the various competing technologies.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:19:00 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A Glimpse at an Enlightened Perl (Exceptions)
